nodes.text: Medd Valii was a male individual who had acquired a large amount of money during his lifetime. Sometime during the reign of the Galactic Empire between the years 19 and 1 BBY, a Neimoidian talked with smuggler Adah Meborman about Valii. The Neimoidian claimed to be related to Valii, and stated that Valii's money had been hidden in the form of pure gold in the arch of the city Tarko-se on the planet Cato Neimoidia. Medd Valii and his money were later mentioned in a security holo log during the Imperial investigation of Adah Meborman.
Medd Valii was first mentioned in the "Tarko-se" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, a LucasArts video game released in 2010.
